description: Primes of the form 2^p - p where p is prime.
comments: Next term, if it exists, has more than 618 digits. - _Emeric Deutsch_, Mar 27 2005Next term, if it exists, has more than 10,000 digits.The corresponding primes p are: 2, 3, 13, 19, .... - _Gerasimov Sergey_, Jul 26 2013
maple: a:=proc(n) if isprime(2^ithprime(n)-ithprime(n))=true then 2^ithprime(n)-ithprime(n) else fi end: seq(a(n),n=1..310); # _Emeric Deutsch_
author: _Labos Elemer_, Oct 19 2000
